text: Dara Singh (19 November 1928 â€“ 12 July 2012) was an Indian wrestler and actor. He started acting in 1952. He was the first sportsman to be nominated to the Rajya Sabha. He worked as Hindi and Punjabi movie producer, director and writer. He acted on movie and television. He was known for his roles in Jab We Met (2007), Kal Ho Naa Ho (2003) and Mera Naam Joker (1972). Singh died on 12 July 2012 at his home in Mumbai, India from cardiac arrest, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Website * Category:1928 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian wrestlers Category:Indian movie producers Category:Indian writers Category:Punjabi people Category:WWE Hall of Fame Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Dara Singh
